episodes.title: Season 3/ Episode 31 | Escaping the Cult |  Davina Kecun
episodes.description:
🎙️ Join us for an eye-opening episode of the Unfiltered Unspoken Podcast with our special guest, Davina Kecun. 

Davina will share her journey of growing up in the Jehovah's Witnesses religious cult and the impact it had on her mental health, causing complex PTSD. She'll discuss her escape at age 28, the decade it took to understand the mental control she was under, and the additional five years to find mental and spiritual freedom.

Davina's story is a powerful testament to the struggles faced by ex-JWs and members of other high-control groups. She'll share how healing her religious trauma led her to become a healer and mentor for others with similar stories.

Listen to Davina's inspiring journey and insights on overcoming religious trauma.

👍 Like, share, and subscribe to our YouTube channel: 
youtube.com/@unfilteredunspokenpodcast to stay updated!

#UnfilteredUnspoken #Podcast #ReligiousTrauma #HealingJourney #ComplexPTSD #DavinaKecun #MentalHealth #SubscribeNow
